cs35013s.view

Class ViewSide

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class ViewSide
extends A_ViewVertical<ViewSide,DescriptorHorizontalLatitude>
    Defines a front view, with latitude on the horizontal axis (increasing left to right) and altitude on the vertical (increasing bottom to top).
    Author:
    Dan Tappan [05.05.13]
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
